blocks.text: Bodo/Glimt stun Inter 3-1: Norway lights up Champions League

Carragher called it 'gigantisk sjokk' â€” he's right. Glimt's 3-1 demolition of Inter is one of the great Norwegian footballing nights. Arsenal stumbled 2-2 at Wolves, still five points clear of City.
